com.tsoft.validationedittext.views

Class ValidationEditText

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
          • com.tsoft.validationedittext.views.ValidationEditText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class ValidationEditText
extends androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    Created by Tsur Yohananov on 14/10/2020.

    A ValidationEditText - View that handles validation ui,
    showing error nicely with animations, hints, input, colors, etc.
    Handles validation logic as individual ValidationEditText as well validate()

    See Also:
    EditTextValidator

      • setTextColor

        public void setTextColor(java.lang.String color)
        Use this method to set the input mEditText background

        From Color.parseColor(String)

        Parse the color string, and return the corresponding color-int. cannot be parsed, throws an IllegalArgumentException pported formats are:

        • #RRGGBB
        • #AARRGGBB

        The following names are also accepted: red, blue, green, black, white, gray, cyan, magenta, yellow, lightgray, darkgray, grey, lightgrey, darkgrey, aqua, fuchsia, lime, maroon, navy, olive, purple, silver, and teal.

        Parameters:
        color - - color String.
        See Also:
        Color.parseColor(String)

      • setErrorText

        public void setErrorText(java.lang.String text)
        Set the error message to show on validation failure

      • setCustomPattern

        public void setCustomPattern(java.lang.String regex)
        Use this method to set your own custom regex.
        Parameters:
        regex- - this string will compile to Pattern, using Pattern.compile(String) This will be the validation pattern.
